name: Orb of Creation [Prototype]
description:
You awake in a dark void.
The only thing in front of you is a glowing orb... Orb of Creation

is a magic- and spell-themed incremental about creating the world around you from nothing but magic.

This game is in a prototype phase and is merely here to showcase the main mechanics. This version does not support save/loading or offline idling. It can be completed in about 30-60 minutes. You will have reached the end-game when you buy "Unlock: The World".

This is my first incremental I've ever worked on, so let me know what you think!

(There is a volume slider in the settings menu, btw)

------------
